<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file This pass does a few optimisations related to Tail predicated loops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and MVE VPT blocks before register allocation is performed. For VPT blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the goal is to maximize the sizes of the blocks that will be created by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// MVE VPT Block Insertion pass (which runs after register allocation). For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tail predicated loops we transform the loop into something that will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// hopefully make the backend ARMLowOverheadLoops pass&#39;s job easier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponding PHI that make up a low overhead loop. Only handles &#39;do&#39; loops</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="#a4aadfbe4795304e72a1a7be77ac88be7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4aadfbe4795304e72a1a7be77ac88be7">findLoopComponents</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3ad01fd9b01e9dde8bd3dc247afbfb7218">ML</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Hardware Loop insertion and ISel Lowering produce the pseudos for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// start of a while loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %a:gprlr = t2WhileLoopSetup %Cnt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   t2WhileLoopStart %a, %BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to convert those to a single instruction which, like t2LoopEndDec and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2DoLoopStartTP is both a terminator and produces a value:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %a:grplr: t2WhileLoopStartLR %Cnt, %BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise if we can&#39;t, we revert the loop. t2WhileLoopSetup and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2WhileLoopStart are not valid past regalloc.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function converts loops with t2LoopEnd and t2LoopEnd instructions into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a single t2LoopEndDec instruction. To do that it needs to make sure that LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be valid to be used for the low overhead loop, which means nothing else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is using LR (especially calls) and there are no superfluous copies in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop. The t2LoopEndDec is a branching terminator that produces a value (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decrement) around the loop edge, which means we need to be careful that they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be valid to allocate without any spilling.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &lt;Instr that uses %K (&#39;User&#39; Operand)&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And returns the newly inserted VPNOT.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This optimization is done in the hopes of preventing spills/reloads of VPR by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reducing the number of VCCR values with overlapping lifetimes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MVETPAndVPTOptimisations::ReplaceRegisterUseWithVPNOT(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This optimisation attempts to reduce the number of overlapping lifetimes of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VCCR values by replacing uses of old VCCR values with VPNOTs. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this replaces</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %A:vccr = (something)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %B:vccr = VPNOT %A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %Foo = (some op that uses %B)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %Bar = (some op that uses %A)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %A:vccr = (something)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %B:vccr = VPNOT %A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %Foo = (some op that uses %B)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %TMP2:vccr = VPNOT %B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %Bar = (some op that uses %A)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MVETPAndVPTOptimisations::ReduceOldVCCRValueUses(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-cskyconstantislandpass-cpp-/#a0bd7d621ba8de56e4052df49da823802">Iter</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.begin(), End = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 4&gt;</a> DeadInstructions;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Iter != End) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> VCCRValue, OppositeVCCRValue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first loop looks for 2 unpredicated instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %A:vccr = (instr)     ; A is stored in VCCRValue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %B:vccr = VPNOT %A    ; B is stored in OppositeVCCRValue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-cskyconstantislandpass-cpp-/#a0bd7d621ba8de56e4052df49da823802">Iter</a> != End; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-cskyconstantislandpass-cpp-/#a0bd7d621ba8de56e4052df49da823802">Iter</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re only interested in unpredicated instructions that write to VCCR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#ab527804ff82cb87d1229cbec56e95778">IsWritingToVCCR</a>(&#42;Iter) ||</span></CodeLine>
